author: Joseph Wilson, Frances D’Emilio and Angela Charlton / AP
title: The Luckiest Cruise Ship in the World: Passengers Spent 15 Weeks on Virus-Free Voyage
description: Unlike other cruise ships that suffered coronavirus outbreaks, the Costa Deliziosa has found no cases of COVID-19 on its voyage.
content:
(BARCELONA, Spain) — For Spanish traveler Carlos Payá, being on an around-the-globe luxury cruise while the rest of the world scurried into their homes for fear of the COVID-19 pandemic was beyond surreal. It was “a stroke of good luck.”
Now, his trip inside… [+5767 chars]
